1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Ali bin Yahya bin Khallad narrated, from his father, from his paternal uncle Rifa'ah bin Rafi' that:He was sitting with the Prophet who said: 'No person's prayer is complete until he performs ablution properly as Allah has commanded him, washing his face, his arms up to the elbows, wiping his head and his feet up to the ankles

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ عَلَى مَا أَمَرَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى
chapter.eng-name: Ablution in accordance with the commands of Allah the Exalted
